X-ACTO® #8R Lightweight Utility Blades

$3.49

Product Actions

Add to cart options
Check store availability
  • -
  • +

X-ACTO® #8R Lightweight Utility Blades

Item # 10061112 
$3.49
Print Favorites
$3.49

Details

http://www.michaels.com/x-acto-number-8r-lightweight-utility-blades/10061112.html

Product Actions

Add to cart options
Check store availability
  • -
  • +
Print Favorite

Description

Description

The #8 lightweight utility blade from X-ACTO is a general purpose blade designed to provide an accurate cut through a variety of different medium density materials, including cardboard, plastic, most papers, foam board, twine and more. The #8 blade also features a dual cutting edge, so when one side begins to dull, simply reverse the blade for a fresh cutting edge and get twice the blade for the price of one! 
 
Details:
  • 5 blades
  • Fits #8 retractable utility knife
The #8 lightweight utility blade from X-ACTO is a general purpose blade designed to provide an accurate cut through a variety of different medium density materials, including cardboard, plastic, most papers, foam board, twine and more. The #8 blade also features a dual cutting edge, so when one side begins to dull, simply reverse the blade for a fresh cutting edge and get twice the blade for the price of one! 
 
Details:
  • 5 blades
  • Fits #8 retractable utility knife
View Less Details
WARNING:
Keep fingers clear of the cutting area; blades are extremely sharp. Caution: Recommended for Adult use only.

Shipping & Returns

Shipping & Returns

Shipping

Most products may be shipped via standard ground (delivered in 5-7 business days), second day or next day. Orders placed by noon (12:00 PM) Central Time using second day or next day will ship the same day. We also offer a ship-to-store option that allows your order to be delivered to any of our Michaels store locations. View Full Shipping Policy and Pricing ›

Returns

If your Michaels.com purchase does not meet your satisfaction, you may return it within six months (180 days) of purchase. To return an item (excluding sample products), the item must be new, unused and in its original packaging. You may return the item to a Michaels store or by mail. View Full Return Policy ›
